title: CanonViolationReport
description: Emitted by world-engine when a story draft contains hard contradictions against the current CanonSnapshot.

episode_id.description: Episode identifier of the draft being validated.

violations.description: List of hard contradictions found. Empty array means no violations.

field.description: Dotted path to the contradicted field, e.g. 'characters.char_lena.age'.

canon_value.description: The value currently held in the CanonSnapshot.

draft_value.description: The value proposed by the story draft.

message.description: Human-readable error string, e.g. 'CONTRADICTION: characters.char_lena.age â€” canon=30 vs draft=31'.
